message: Let's start with a simple split. I believe this fair offer allows us both to benefit.
Alice, your offer was a bit unbalanced. Let's make this fair. I propose a 55/45 split in my favor.  It benefits us both to settle this quickly.
Bob, your offer was heavily skewed in your favor.  I'm proposing a more balanced split closer to the middle.  Let's settle this fairly and avoid further losses from inflation.
